title: Burger Burger
creator_credit: Gavin Jun Jie Tan and Huang Shicong
brief_description: The story of a marooned explorer who meets some local wildlife, with a scary - but eventually serendipitous - outcome. This colourful, fast-paced short animation won Best Animation at the Singapore Short Film Awards 2011.
creator_credit_for_label: Gavin Jun Jie Tan and Huang Shicong
